hero.title: UCU INN
hero.location: You can find us in Collegium 2. The reception is located on the 1st floor on the parking lot side (Ivana Franka Street)

twin.title: Standard Twin Room
twin.description: Comfortable room with all amenities for a pleasant stay

semiLuxury.title: Family Junior Suite
semiLuxury.description: Spacious two-room suite with additional amenities and a great view

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: UCU INN is a place where you can find the best of the best. We offer many interesting places to explore. You can discover the finest accommodations here.
gallery.waitingArea: Guest waiting area at the reception
gallery.lounge: Lounge area on the floor with an iron

info.findUs: UCU Inn is waiting for you

description.location: a comfortable guesthouse in a picturesque area of Lviv near Stryiskyi Park. Book in a way that's convenient for you and come for a stay. Check-in: after 14:00; Check-out: before 12:00. We also offer a safe shelter, fresh coffee, and aromatic tea at the reception.

amenities.title: Guest amenities:
amenities.text: All rooms are equipped with private bathrooms featuring showers, hairdryers, and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises, and parking is provided for guest vehicles.

comfort.title: Modern comfort:
comfort.text: Thoughtful design, cozy rooms, and our attention to cleanliness create the perfect atmosphere for a pleasant stay.

activities.title: Hiking opportunities:
activities.text: Near the hotel, you will find great hiking trails, and proximity to the city center allows easy access to major attractions.

location.title: Our address:
location.reception: The reception is located on the 1st floor on the parking lot side (Ivana Franka Street)
location.mapPlaceholder: Interactive map loads on demand to save data. Load it when you're ready.

additionalInfo.wifi: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the campus:
additionalInfo.bedTypes: Rooms with two separate beds or one double bed are available. The Junior Suite has two rooms.

bathroom.description: Each room has its own bathroom and a hairdryer
